Bobertron saw magmatron's shots and and smiled as he passed him. Keep them busy while i get to the base and get this guy repaired. He is not in good shape.  I just cant resist helping someone: 
(to much controversy on my last post)

::Magmatron::
    He heard the message from Bobertron. "Mantella, now we have a real 
situation, lock onto Bobertron's cairdinates, we have a fight. Shredder you 
help also. I'm on my way."
    "Right this way" Magmatron said pointing to the weapons room. "Take what 
you need."
    He transformed into Beast Mode and flew to the battle, he saw Bobertron 
attacking. He knew who were emimies. He transformed into Robot Mode and 
attacked. His jets caught him just in time and he hovered there pumping out 
shot after shot.
    


---------------------------------
